short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Px-rem-converter converts px to rem and rem to px in real time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Px to Rem converter is a simple Chrome extension that converts px to rem and rem to px in real time, allowing to copy the converted value to the clipboard.
